title: Freelancer
description: I took orders from Armut or other sites for website construction and continued to improve myself in web development, mostly freelancing during my university years until 2022.

title: React Developer
description: Since I had a compulsory internship at the university, I started working as an intern in the summer of 2023 and during this process I improved myself, I also made observations about how the workflow is in corporate companies and tried to become an intermediate developer in ReactJS and NextJS frameworks.

title: React Developer
description: After the end of my internship period, they offered me a valid job offer because they were satisfied with what I did at work and I also continued to improve myself in new technologies from this process

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: After nearly 1 year of working time, I realized that I needed to develop myself in new areas and I also set sail for new channels in order not to remain only as a front-end developer in the market, and in this process, the Edict Digital family helped and continues to help me, thanks to them, I developed myself in Java and its framework, Spring Boot, and I continue to work on it.
